## NdQuadtreeMap class

Point-based quadtree for nD keys and optional value association. Supports radial range queries and key removal with tree pruning. See .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NdQuadtreeMap<K extends ReadonlyVec, V> implements ICopy<NdQuadtreeMap<K, V>>, IEmpty<NdQuadtreeMap<K, V>>, IRegionQuery<K, V, number>, ISpatialMap<K, V> 
```

## Remarks

Partially ported from Clojure version of [http://thi.ng/geom](http://thi.ng/geom)<!-- -->.

|  [fromMinMax(min, max)](./geom-accel.ndquadtreemap.fromminmax.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns a new point-based <code>NdQuadtreeMap</code> for nD keys in given region defined by <code>min</code> / <code>max</code> coordinates. The dimensionality of the tree is implicitly defined by the provided coordinates. Only points within that region can be indexed. |
